courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: AFAS 111 or consent of instructor. Requires concurrent enrollment with AFAS 102.
description: "The Foundations of the United States Air Force" is a survey course designed to introduce students to the United States Air Force and provides an overview of the basic characteristics, missions, and organization of the Air Force. Prerequisite: AFAS 111 or consent of instructor. Requires concurrent enrollment with AFAS 102.
label: Found of the US Air Force II
